T02D2618:89b-1: bim sha ti a'a k'a ra bhi bo dhi kra
T02D2618:89b-2: ma na bha ga b'a na manydzu shr'i s'a dha
T02D2618:89b-4: rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D2618:89b-5: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2618:89b-6: de dang de yis theg pa yis //
T02D2618:89b-7: thabs kyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02D2618:89b-8: theg pa gcig gis bdag nyid can //
T02D2618:89b-10: shin tu dad pa'i ro cig pa //
T02D2618:89b-11: mi g-yo dus kyi rtogs bya ba //
T02D2618:89b-12: bdag nyid chen po gang yin pa //
T02D2618:90a-2: dad pa'i khyad par ma rtogs yang //
T02D2618:90a-3: chags pa'i dbang gis sems can bzhin //
T02D2618:90a-4: 'dod chags la sogs la gnas kyang //
T02D2618:90a-5: gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2618:90a-6: dkon mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid can //
T02D2618:90a-7: dkon mchog gsum gyi don byed mgon //
T02D2618:90a-8: kun du [*kun tu?] don byed ltos med par //
T02D2618:90a-9: skyob ba de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2618:90a-10: de yi stobs kyis da ltar bdag /'jam dpal gnyis su med pa yi //
T02D2618:90a-11: rnam pa nyi shus mngon rtogs pa //
T02D2618:90a-12: sems can don du bshad par bya //
T02D2618:90a-13: dang por langs nas rnal 'byor ni //
T02D2618:90a-14: rang gi lha yi nga rgyal can //
T02D2618:90a-15: rnam dag cho ga bzhin byas nas //
T02D2618:90a-16: mchod pa dman na bsdu bar bya //
T02D2618:90a-18: dri ma yang ni bsal bar bya //
T02D2618:90a-19: aom sa manta pa ri khsa gu hya tsa ra tsa ta h'um /
T02D2618:90a-20: de yi rjes la skyang nul bya //
T02D2618:90a-21: aom ni rma ni sho dha h'um /
T02D2618:90a-22: drir bcas chu yi thigs pa yis //
T02D2618:90a-23: skyob pa la yang mandala bya //
T02D2618:90a-25: sngar nyid langs pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2618:90a-26: 'jam pa'i stan la gnas par bya //
T02D2618:90a-27: aom aa mu ka padmo bha sundha ra dha re mandala la h'um /
T02D2618:90a-28: snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02D2618:90a-29: sangs rgyas mthong nas 'dud par bya: / aom sa
T02D2618:90a-30: ba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'a ka tsitta
T02D2618:90a-31: pra na me na badzra banda nam ka ro mi
T02D2618:90a-32: / sna tshogs mchod cing de dag la //
T02D2618:90a-33: dang por phyag 'tshal gzhan yang bya //
T02D2618:90a-34: de nas skal dang ldan pa ni //
T02D2618:90a-35: sprul zhing rnam par mchod par bya //
T02D2618:90a-36: nyes pa byas pa'i mchod pa yis //
T02D2618:90a-37: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya //
T02D2618:90a-38: bdag gis bgyis dang bgyid stsal gang //
T02D2618:90a-39: chung du'am ni tshad med pa //
T02D2618:90a-40: gang yang rjes su yi rang ba //
T02D2618:90a-41: de dag skyob pas gshegs par mdzod //
T02D2618:90a-42: bdag gis 'jug par bya ba yis //
T02D2618:90a-43: de dag sems can rang nyid kyi //
T02D2618:90a-44: las la 'jug pa de dag gis //
T02D2618:90a-45: byas pa rnams la legs zhes gsol //
T02D2618:90a-46: sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su gsol //
T02D2618:90a-47: de bzhin chos kyi dkon mchog la //
T02D2618:90a-48: sangs rgyas kyi gang gdul ba bya //
T02D2618:90a-49: blo chen mgon po de la yang //
T02D2618:90a-50: sdug bsngal rgal bar dka' ba ni //
T02D2618:90a-51: gzhan gyi bdag gis bzod mi nus //
T02D2618:90b-0: de na @90b de nyid sel bar byed //
T02D2618:90b-1: bdag ni 'jig rten mgon por shog / sems can bla ma sangs rgyas dang //
T02D2618:90b-2: byang chub sems dpa' de ci bzhin //
T02D2618:90b-3: de bzhin slob ma rjes mthun ma //
T02D2618:90b-4: bdag gis lam la 'jug par bya //
T02D2618:90b-5: gang yang bdag gi dge ba'i cha //
T02D2618:90b-6: dri med gnas par gyur pa ni //
T02D2618:90b-7: de yis sems can gyi don du //
T02D2618:90b-8: rgyun du rjes su mthun par shog / aom ma
T02D2618:90b-9: h'a sarba p'a pam k'a ya b'aka tsitta sa ma
T02D2618:90b-10: na satbh'u tam ra ga dhi sha m'u ha da
T02D2618:90b-11: ma da ma na aa bhi shi ta yamkrittam ka
T02D2618:90b-12: le kam h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
T02D2618:90b-13: sarba p'a bam spho ta yua me sva h'a /
T02D2618:90b-14: aom sarba th'a ga ta sha na sv'a h'a /
T02D2618:90b-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'a m'atma bha bam ni rya ta y'a mi /
T02D2618:90b-16: sarba ta th'a ga ta pra ti grihn'a na sva mi mam sv'a h'a /
T02D2618:90b-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pu tye dzny'a na
T02D2618:90b-18: sam bha ra aa nu mu da ye sv'a h'a
T02D2618:90b-19: / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sa manta bha
T02D2618:90b-20: dra ma h'a badzra sa ma yam ma h'a bho
T02D2618:90b-21: dhi tsi tto tp'a dam autp'a da y'a mi sv'a
T02D2618:90b-22: / h'a / aom sarba p'a pam pra ti thi na ya me sa tye sarba sa tv'a n'am /
T02D2618:90b-23: sarba siddhya sam sa tya na ti sarba ta th'a ga ta shtsa aa de sha na ti /
T02D2618:90b-24: aom sarba shuddha: sarbba dharmm'a: sva shuddha: asrbba dharmm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D2618:90b-25: sems can 'di dag bde bar shog / sdug bsngal
T02D2618:90b-26: kun yang sel bar shog / de dag bde bas
T02D2618:90b-27: bdag nyid tshim // 'di dag nyon mongs bral bar shog / rang bzhin med dang gtsang la sogs //
T02D2618:90b-28: mtshan ma med dang yid mi 'byung //
T02D2618:90b-29: 'di dag thams cad de yi phyir //
T02D2618:90b-30: bdag gis gang las rnam par 'khrul //
T02D2618:90b-31: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na ba dzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D2618:90b-32: de nas rgyal ba'i bka' lung gis //
T02D2618:90b-33: zla ba gnyis su mthong bar bya //
T02D2618:90b-34: de yang ba stan nas gcig 'gyur zhing //
T02D2618:90b-35: de yi bdag nyid du gyur pa //
T02D2618:90b-36: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam nyid du /
T02D2618:90b-37: blo gros chen pos gzhug par bya //
T02D2618:90b-38: aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi //
T02D2618:90b-39: aom dzny'a na ra sme be sre dza h'um /
T02D2618:90b-42: aom sam h'a ra na badzra /
T02D2618:90b-44: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na badzra /
T02D2618:90b-46: aom ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga ta ta th'a aa ham /
T02D2618:90b-47: de nas gzhan don byed pa'i phyir //
T02D2618:90b-48: slar yang 'di ltar bsgom par bya //
T02D2618:90b-49: khro bo'i gzugs ni 'chang ba yis /
T02D2618:91a-0: @91a * // snying gar padma nyi h'um las //
T02D2618:91a-1: khro bo bcu yis bgegs kyi gtso //
T02D2618:91a-2: lus ngag yid gsum phur bus gdab //
T02D2618:91a-3: phyi rol rdo rje rab sogs //
T02D2618:91a-4: rnam par sprul ba byas nas ni //
T02D2618:91a-5: h'um yig gnyis kyi dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D2618:91a-6: 'og tu yam bam ram dag las //
T02D2618:91a-7: rlung dang chu dang me dag ni //
T02D2618:91a-8: dkyil 'khor de nyid rim pas bsgom //
T02D2618:91a-9: mkha' la bhr'um yig las byung ba'i //
T02D2618:91a-10: rtag pa'i yan lag las skyes pa //
T02D2618:91a-11: bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi tshogs kyis ni //
T02D2618:91a-12: gang ba'i snod kyi bdag nyid gyur //
T02D2618:91a-13: h'um gnyis dbus su bam yig las //
T02D2618:91a-14: sku yi rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2618:91a-15: brtan zhing sra bar gyur pa yi //
T02D2618:91a-16: gser gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du gyur //
T02D2618:91a-17: ngos gnyis rnam pa'i h'um yig dang //
T02D2618:91a-18: sum las skyes pa'i lhun po'i steng //
T02D2618:91a-19: bhr'um las gyur pa dpal dang ldan //
T02D2618:91a-20: gzhal yas khang brtsegs bsgom par bya //
T02D2618:91a-21: de yi dbus su sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D2618:91a-22: chu skyes steng du seng ge'i gdan //
T02D2618:91a-23: der ni dbyangs yig dang po las //
T02D2618:91a-24: kun da'i 'od ldan rnam snang mdzad //
T02D2618:91a-25: bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i //
T02D2618:91a-26: zhal bzhi mnyam gzhag phyag rgya can //
T02D2618:91a-27: de yi mdun du mi bskyod pa //
T02D2618:91a-28: rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i ;
T02D2618:91a-29: / glang po'i steng du zla ba la //
T02D2618:91a-30: nam mkha'i mdog can bsam par bya //
T02D2618:91a-31: lho ru rdo rje nyi ma yang //
T02D2618:91a-32: rta yi steng du zla ba la //
T02D2618:91a-33: rin chen dril bu dang ldan pa //
T02D2618:91a-34: gser gyi mdog ni rnam par bsam //
T02D2618:91a-35: nub tu padma gar dbang yang //
T02D2618:91a-36: rma bya'i steng gi zla ba la //
T02D2618:91a-37: padma'i dril bu dang bcas pa //
T02D2618:91a-38: padma r'a ga'i mdog can bsam //
T02D2618:91a-39: byang gi phyogs su rta mchog kyang //
T02D2618:91a-40: mkha' lding gser 'od la gnas pa'i //
T02D2618:91a-41: sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu mdzes //
T02D2618:91a-42: sna tshogs pa yi mdog can bsgom //
T02D2618:91a-43: de dag gi yang thugs kar ni //
T02D2618:91a-44: dang por sangs rgyas bsgom bya ste //
T02D2618:91a-45: dpal ldan zhal lnga phyag brgyang pa //
T02D2618:91a-47: ngo mtshar drag po sgeg pa dang //
T02D2618:91a-48: dgod dang bcas pa'i zhal mnga' ba //
T02D2618:91a-49: g-yas g-yon ral gri pu sti dag / bdag nyid chen pos bzhi bzhi bsnams //
T02D2618:91a-50: 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02D2618:91b-0: sems @91b can rnams ni tshim par byed //
T02D2618:91b-1: re re'i thugs kar 'khor lo ni //
T02D2618:91b-2: rtsibs bcu gnyis la dbyangs yig ldan //
T02D2618:91b-3: phyi rol k'a li nang na yang //
T02D2618:91b-4: aom sarba dharm'a'i sngags su bcas //
T02D2618:91b-5: thams cad la yang khyad med par //
T02D2618:91b-6: de steng shes rab 'khor lo ste //
T02D2618:91b-7: phyi rol aa a'a sogs kyis mtshan //
T02D2618:91b-8: nang gi mu khyud a'a lir ldan //
T02D2618:91b-9: khyad par gtso bo'i 'khor lo ni //
T02D2618:91b-10: rtsibs drug gsang sngags drug dang ldan //
T02D2618:91b-11: gzhan dag gi yang rang rang mtshan //
T02D2618:91b-12: aom dang ya te na mar bcas //
T02D2618:91b-13: na ma rtsibs gcig la bsdongs nas //
T02D2618:91b-14: lhag ma yi ge'i grangs bzhin brtsigs //
T02D2618:91b-15: gnyis med 'jam dpal gtso bo ni //
T02D2618:91b-16: ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya //
T02D2618:91b-17: rang rigs phyag rgya can gnyis gnyis //
T02D2618:91b-19: gzhan dag la yang khyad med par //
T02D2618:91b-20: ral gri g-yas pa la mtshan no //
T02D2618:91b-21: g-yon pas rdo rje rin chen dang //
T02D2618:91b-22: chu skyes sna tshogs rdor dril 'chang //
T02D2618:91b-23: de yang gnyis pa lnga pa dang //
T02D2618:91b-24: dang po bzhi pa ye shes sku //
T02D2618:91b-25: kun kyang gzhon nu'i rgyan dang ldan //
T02D2618:91b-27: rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po ste //
T02D2618:91b-28: rdo rje dang ni dril bu 'chang //
T02D2618:91b-29: rgyal po ser po lcags kyu 'chang //
T02D2618:91b-30: chags pa dmar po mda' gzhu can //
T02D2618:91b-31: legs pa ljang gu legs spyin pa //
T02D2618:91b-32: mi bskyod pa yi 'khor du gnas //
T02D2618:91b-33: rin chen dril 'chang rin chen ser //
T02D2618:91b-34: nyi ma nyi bzhin g-yas nyi 'dzin //
T02D2618:91b-35: ljang gu tog ni rgyal mtshan 'dzin //
T02D2618:91b-36: g-yon pa gdan la gnyis ka yang //
T02D2618:91b-37: bzhad pa dkar po so phreng 'dzin //
T02D2618:91b-38: snga ma bzhin du g-yon pa yis //
T02D2618:91b-41: rnon po ral gri pu sti dkar //
T02D2618:91b-43: smra ba ljang gu ljags 'dzin pa //
T02D2618:91b-44: gnyis ka g-yon pa gdan la brten //
T02D2618:91b-46: las ni ljang gu rgya gram gyis //
T02D2618:91b-47: bsrung ba ser po go cha can //
T02D2618:91b-48: gnod spyin nag po mche ba 'dzin //
T02D2618:91b-49: khu tshur ser po khu tshur 'dzin //
T02D2618:91b-50: don yod grub pa'i 'khor du gnas //
T02D2618:92a-2: bsams nas rim bzhin mchod par bya //
T02D2618:92a-3: mchod pa'i rim pa dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D2618:92a-4: cho ga nyid las shes par bya //
T02D2618:92a-5: snying po dang ni nye snying po //
T02D2618:92a-6: rgyal ba kun kyang mnyes par bya //
T02D2618:92a-7: lhag ma kun gyis bzlas pa'i sngags //
T02D2618:92a-8: yi ge gsum po shes par bya //
T02D2618:92a-9: gzhan dag rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bcas //
T02D2618:92a-10: rang rang gnas su bsams nas ni //
T02D2618:92a-11: de yi nga rgyal dang ldan pas //
T02D2618:92a-12: ci rigs pa ni spyang bar bya //
T02D2618:92a-13: rnal 'byor ldan pa'i dus su yang //
T02D2618:92a-14: mtshan brjod dang ni bstod pa yis //
T02D2618:92a-15: rgyal ba 'khor bcas bstod nas ni //
T02D2618:92a-16: dus gsum du tshe don mtshan bya //
T02D2618:92a-17: rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa'i sgrub thabs //
T02D2618:92a-18: dpal ldan so ma shr'i sa mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2618:92a-20: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma h'a dzny'a na dang /
